text:
@realDonaldTrump 2.4 MILLION more, for first time, filed unemployment claims last week.

Guessing that lifting of restrictions endangering lives is not working out. 

Total unemployment since coronavirus is more than 38 MILLION.

#TrumpIsTheWORSTPresidentEVER
